answers.answer: Hi!This level is very high. Take him to urgent care or a free clinic to get medications. He needs to take them as soon as possible. Until then, let him take more of fruits and green veggies, clear soups etc. Try and arrange medications meanwhile—as soon as possible.Take care!The medical advice given should not be considered a substitute for medical care provided by a doctor who can examine you. The advice may not be completely correct for you as the doctor cannot examine you and does not know your complete medical history. Hence this reply to your post should only be considered as a guiding line and you must consult your doctor at the earliest for your medical problem.

question: my dad has a blood sugar reading of 270 4 hours after eating. he is out of his medication. what should I do.
title: Diabetes
